sentence: And Burton argued that "the reason they are engaging in reckless gerrymandering in the 11th hour like ignoring court orders in Ohio and Ron DeSantis forcing a clearly unconstitutional map upon the people of Florida is because they failed to draw themselves into a congressional majority everywhere else.

title: Republicans claim victory in congressional redistricting fight
